CHAT.comment: GRANITE ROCK COMPANY, Petitioner v. INTERNATIONAL BROTHERHOOD OF TEAMSTERS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:59 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GARRY G. MATHIASON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL EXAMINATION OF ROBERT BONSALL ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT TEAMSTERS LOCAL 287
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PETER D. NUSSBAUM ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT INTERNATIONAL BROTHERHOOD OF TEAMSTERS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GARRY G. MATHIASON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
